DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label study evaluate efficacy safety atezolizumab compare chemotherapy consist platinum agent ( cisplatin carboplatin per investigator discretion ) combine either pemetrexed ( non-squamous disease ) gemcitabine ( squamous disease ) program death-ligand 1 ( PD-L1 ) -selected participant chemotherapy-naive Stage IV Non-Squamous Squamous NSCLC .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Atezolizumab ( MPDL3280A ) Compared With Platinum Agent ( Cisplatin Carboplatin ) + ( Pemetrexed Gemcitabine ) Participants With Stage IV Non-Squamous Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) IMpower110
